div.bibl: Krasnow Scrapbooks, Vol. I, Owned by Dr. H. R. Krasnow, 4601 N. Broadway, Chicago, Ill.

body.p: Today (July ) a concert and dedicated to the memory of the recently deceased George Valentinovich Plekhanov will take place in the evening at the Bowen Hall of House, corner Polk and Halsted Sts.
The following will speak about the life of G. V. Plekhanov:

F. , editor of the Lithuanian Socialist newspaper , editor of the Jewish Socialist newspaper Welt; S. Holland, member of the executive committee of the Socialist Party of Cook County; of the Russian Social-Democratic Club.

The Russian Social-Democratic Club has prepared a very interesting concert in the program of which will participate the Symphomy orchestra ',' the pianist , a violinist and
the vocalist Mrs. It begins at 8 P. M. Admission 15 cents.
Ed. Note: This was probably in 1918 or 1919.
